ingredients.ingredient: 16 large shrimp - peeled, deveined, and tails on, or more to taste
3 large cloves garlic, smashed, or more to taste

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry before cooking to ensure proper browning and caramelization
Cook over high heat for just 2-3 minutes per side to keep shrimp tender
Add lemon juice and zest at the end of cooking to preserve the bright citrus flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through quick searing shrimp and finishing with bright lemon and garlic flavors without overcooking the delicate protein.
